textBox.richText: President’s Day weekend...Max doesn’t have school Thursday through Monday, and Alli is gonna be in Atlanta for a Rugby Tourney. That means BOYS WEEKEND!!! WP reported 6.5” of fresh on Thursday...we hit Short Haul first. Max ended up back-seating a jump, and losing his pole (and his glove!) He went in for a break...I had to do a GLORIOUS lap through Belle (see first vid below). After that, he was ready to come back out. We ended up doing the Chutes a bunch of times, a bunch of Bumps, and, of course, upper Tophers. Vid #2 also below. Quote from Max: “I think this is the best day of the season”.
